pages.title: Mushroom Mutation
pages.text: Resourceshrooms have a random chance to mutate each time they spread.$(br)Some mutations have extra requirements like having another mushroom as a neighbor of the goal location.$(br)The easiest way to find all mutations is by using the EMI.

pages.name: Neighbors
pages.text: When a mushroom mutations to the red Terracotta all blocks marked with a glass are regarded as neighbors.
